channel.title: HELP Navigating Menus No Mouse?
channel.description:
Running Windows 7 PC
Just downloaded & installed both Steam and Black Mesa & my kid & I have NO idea of how to even navigate the Black Mesa submenu system.
No mouse but arrow keys & [ENTER] work in [b]Main Menu[/b], (below) Resume Game New Game Load Game Save Game Achievements Options Quit
Once in any submenu, (specifically Load Game), still no mouse or cursor seen & unable to navigate by tabbing or arrow keys in sub menus, we're totally at a loss.
Are these menus supposed to be navigatable with PC mouse & if not then how? Do I need to somehow enable the mouse within Steam or the Black Mesa game?
At PC gaming I'm pretty rusty, (original Half Life PC version was the last PC game I played [i]years[/i] ago). Completely lost here, any information much appreciated!
